snippet: Rebekah Brooks and Andy Coulson, pivotal figures in the phone hacking scandal, will testify before a public inquiry next week.
abstract: Rebekah Brooks and Andy Coulson, two former executives at Rupert Murdoch’s British tabloid newspapers who are pivotal figures in the phone hacking scandal, will give evidence to a public inquiry.
lead_paragraph: Rebekah Brooks and Andy Coulson, pivotal figures in the phone hacking scandal, will testify before a public inquiry next week.

headline.main: Britain: Ex-Officials in Murdoch Empire to Face Questions in Hacking Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Britain: Ex-Officials in Murdoch Empire To Face Questions in Hacking Inquiry
